description: A Jersey police officer admits two disciplinary charges for using "prejudicial language".
title: Jersey police officer 'reprimanded' after homophobic slur video
title_page: Jersey police officer 'reprimanded' after homophobic slur video - BBC News
maintext: He said: "We are liaising with the LGBT community regarding lessons learnt from the incident, and how we can continue to work together to protect all islanders."
